name: Ruth vs Root
description:
Ruth, the Queen of all ants, has to find a way to escape her nest as it's being attacked by the roots of an evil tree, while also rescuing as many of her minions as she can.

It's an endless runner where you can move 360 degreen in you nest to dodge the invading roots, You get points by staying alive and a multiplier given by how many ants you can collect and carry along.

Just download -> Un-ZIP -> Execute "RuthVsRoot.exe"

Done in 48 hous for the 2023' Global Game Jam by Sergio Frágola, Bartolomé Jabase, Joaquín Jabase, Francico Gomez, Lautaro Reinoso, Ivan Vargas Renzo y Francisco Martinez.

The Theme for the Jam  was "Roots"
